synopsis.text: Your Forma, initially a groundbreaking technology to combat encephalitis, has now become an indispensable part of everyday life, allowing direct access to people's thoughts, emotions, and experiences. For skilled investigator Echika Hieda, this technology is a powerful tool to delve into people's memories and uncover hidden evidence. However, her exceptional abilities have left her assistants hospitalized, forcing her superiors to assign her an AI-controlled android partner, Harold Lucraft. As Echika grapples with her disdain for androids and the biggest case of her career, will Harold prove to be a valuable ally or just another burden? Join Echika and Harold as they navigate the complex world of memory and technology to solve intricate crimes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
